Addendum IV to AvSec Circular No. 5/2019

Sub: Minimum standards for Civil Aviation Security Equipment-Body
Scanner-reg.

In exercise of powers conferred under rules 61 and 62 of the Aircraft (Security)
Rules 2023, Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security, for the purpose
of the safety and security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general
public in all matters relating to safeguarding against acts of unlawful
interference with civil aviation, directs for revised timeline to earlier circulated
under para 5 of Annexure-B of this Bureau AvSec Circular No. 5/2019 dated

8.4.2019 read with its Addendum-III dated 17.3.2023 issued on the subject
matter.
